SEARCH

Uses of Package
org.eclipse.jface.bindings

Packages that use org.eclipse.jface.bindings
Package
Description
org.eclipse.e4.ui.bindings
 
org.eclipse.e4.ui.bindings.internal
 
org.eclipse.jface.action
Provides support for shared UI resources such as menus, tool bars, and status lines.
org.eclipse.jface.bindings
Provides support for bindings between commands and various user input events (e.g., keyboard shortcuts).
org.eclipse.jface.bindings.keys
Provides support for bindings between commands and keys.
org.eclipse.ui.internal
 
org.eclipse.ui.keys
Provides support for integrating keys into the Eclipse workbench.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.jface.bindings used by org.eclipse.e4.ui.bindings
    Class
    Description
    Binding
    A binding is a link between user input and the triggering of a particular command.
    TriggerSequence
    A sequence of one or more triggers.

    A binding is a link between user input and the triggering of a particular command.

  • Classes in org.eclipse.jface.bindings used by org.eclipse.jface.action
    Class
    Description
    BindingManager
    A central repository for bindings -- both in the defined and undefined states.
    BindingManagerEvent
    An instance of this class describes changes to an instance of BindingManager.
    IBindingManagerListener
    An instance of BindingManagerListener can be used by clients to receive notification of changes to an instance of BindingManager.
    TriggerSequence
    A sequence of one or more triggers.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.jface.bindings used by org.eclipse.jface.bindings
    Class
    Description
    Binding
    A binding is a link between user input and the triggering of a particular command.
    BindingManager
    A central repository for bindings -- both in the defined and undefined states.
    BindingManagerEvent
    An instance of this class describes changes to an instance of BindingManager.
    IBindingManagerListener
    An instance of BindingManagerListener can be used by clients to receive notification of changes to an instance of BindingManager.
    ISchemeListener
    An instance of ISchemeListener can be used by clients to receive notification of changes to one or more instances of IScheme.
    Scheme
    An instance of IScheme is a handle representing a binding scheme as defined by the extension point org.eclipse.ui.bindings.
    SchemeEvent
    An instance of this class describes changes to an instance of IScheme.
    Trigger
    The abstract class for any object that can be used as a trigger for a binding.
    TriggerSequence
    A sequence of one or more triggers.
